DzContentSearchOptions Class Reference

This class allows you to specify options when searching content. More...

#include <dzcontentsearchoptions.h>

Detailed Description

This class allows you to specify options when searching content.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum DzContentSearchOptions::PlatinumClub

Determines whether search results will be for platinum club items

Enumerator:
PlatClub 

Search results are returned for platinum club items

NonPlatClub 

Search results are returned for non platinum club items

enum DzContentSearchOptions::PlatinumSale

Determines whether search results will be for platinum club items on sale

Enumerator:
PlatSale 

Search results are returned for platinum club items on sale

NonPlatSale 

Search results are returned for non platinum club items that are not on sale

enum DzContentSearchOptions::SaleItems

Determines whether search results will be for items on sale or not

Enumerator:
OnSale 

Search results are returned for items on sale

NotOnSale 

Search results are returned for items that are not on sale

enum DzContentSearchOptions::SortBy

Determines how content search results should be sorted

Enumerator:
None 

Search results are not sorted

Popularity 

Search results are sorted based on their popularity

Date 

Search results are sorted by date

Price 

Search results are sorted by price

Alphabetical 

Search results are sorted alphabetically

enum DzContentSearchOptions::SortOrder

Determines whether search results will be returned in Ascending or Descending order

Enumerator:
Ascending 

Search results are returned in Ascending order

Descending 

Search results are returned in Descending order

enum DzContentSearchOptions::Store

Determines the stores to return results for

Enumerator:
Standard 

Search results are returned for items that are part of the standard store

Developer 

Search results are returned for items that are part of the developer store

All 

Search results are returned for items that are in all stores

enum DzContentSearchOptions::Vendor

Determines the types of vendors that will be included in search results

Enumerator:
DazOriginal 

Search results are returned for DAZ Original vendors

PublishedArtist 

Search results are returned for published artist vendors
